tasks.title: Set up Core LLM Environment and Integration
tasks.description: Establish the foundational environment for LLM interaction, including installing necessary libraries, configuring API keys, and setting up basic communication with the chosen LLM provider (e.g., OpenAI, Hugging Face).
tasks.details: This involves selecting an LLM service, setting up authentication, and creating a wrapper or utility class for making API calls. Focus on robust error handling and rate limiting.
tasks.testStrategy: Unit tests for LLM API client connectivity. Integration tests for a simple prompt-response cycle.

tasks.title: Develop PDF Proposal Text Extraction Module
tasks.description: Create a robust module capable of ingesting PDF files, extracting all textual content, and pre-processing it for optimal LLM consumption (e.g., cleaning, handling multi-column layouts, basic chunking).
tasks.details: Research and implement a suitable PDF parsing library (e.g., PyPDF2, pdfminer.six, pypdf). Handle various PDF structures and potential OCR needs if text is image-based (though initial focus can be on text-based PDFs).
tasks.testStrategy: Unit tests with various PDF samples (simple, complex, multi-page) to ensure accurate text extraction. Integration tests with the LLM environment for pre-processing.

tasks.title: Implement AI/LLM for Project Summary & Member Extraction
tasks.description: Design and implement the LLM prompting strategy and post-processing logic to extract the project summary, key details, and initial team members/roles from the parsed PDF text.
tasks.details: Develop specific prompts to guide the LLM in identifying and structuring this information. Implement robust parsing of the LLM's natural language output into a structured JSON format that maps to the Project and Members data models.
tasks.testStrategy: Unit tests for prompt effectiveness and output parsing with various proposal text snippets. Integration tests with the PDF extraction module.

tasks.title: Implement AI/LLM for Epic Generation
tasks.description: Develop the AI/LLM logic to analyze the project proposal text and automatically identify and generate high-level Epics, representing major functional areas or goals of the project.
tasks.details: Craft prompts that encourage the LLM to break down the project into logical, distinct Epics. Implement mechanisms to ensure consistency and avoid redundancy. Store the generated Epics in the database, linked to the project.
tasks.testStrategy: Unit tests with different proposal texts to verify Epic identification and relevance. Manual review of generated Epics for accuracy and completeness.

tasks.title: Implement AI/LLM for Sub-Epic & User Story Generation
tasks.description: Extend the AI/LLM capabilities to further decompose generated Epics into Sub-Epics and then into detailed User Stories, including acceptance criteria where possible.
tasks.details: This will likely involve chained LLM calls or more complex prompting strategies, feeding the LLM with an Epic's context to generate its children. Ensure the hierarchical relationships are correctly established and stored in the database.
tasks.testStrategy: Unit tests for hierarchical decomposition accuracy. Manual review of generated Sub-Epics and User Stories for logical flow and completeness.

tasks.title: Implement Core Database Schema
tasks.description: Design and implement the database schema for the core entities: User, Members, Proposal, Project, Backlog, Epic, SubEpic, UserStory, Task, Sprint.
tasks.details: Use an ORM (e.g., SQLAlchemy, Django ORM, TypeORM) to define models corresponding to the data model. Ensure proper relationships (one-to-many, many-to-many) and indexing for performance.
tasks.testStrategy: Database migration tests. Unit tests for ORM model definitions and basic CRUD operations.

tasks.title: Develop Backend API for Proposal Upload & AI Trigger
tasks.description: Create a RESTful API endpoint that allows Project Managers to upload PDF proposals. This endpoint will trigger the entire AI parsing and project initialization workflow.
tasks.details: Implement file upload handling, secure storage of PDFs, and asynchronous processing of the AI pipeline to avoid blocking the API response. Provide feedback mechanisms for processing status.
tasks.testStrategy: API integration tests for file upload and successful triggering of the AI pipeline. Stress tests for concurrent uploads.

tasks.title: Develop Backend API for Backlog Generation Request
tasks.description: Create a dedicated API endpoint that Project Managers can call to explicitly request the AI/LLM to generate or re-generate the backlog hierarchy (Epics, Sub-Epics, User Stories) for a given project.
tasks.details: This endpoint should accept a projectId and trigger the AI/LLM processes for backlog generation. It should handle cases where a backlog already exists (e.g., update or append).
tasks.testStrategy: API integration tests for triggering backlog generation and verifying data persistence.

tasks.title: Develop Basic Frontend for Proposal Upload
tasks.description: Create a minimal user interface that allows Project Managers to select and upload PDF proposal files to the backend API.
tasks.details: Implement a file input element, an upload button, and basic visual feedback (e.g., loading spinner, success/error message). Focus on functionality over aesthetics for this initial version.
tasks.testStrategy: End-to-end tests for successful file upload and backend API interaction. User acceptance testing for basic usability.

tasks.title: Develop Basic Frontend for Initial Project/Backlog View
tasks.description: Create a read-only frontend component to display the project summary and the initial AI-generated backlog hierarchy (Epics, Sub-Epics, User Stories).
tasks.details: This component will fetch data from the backend and render it in a structured, readable format (e.g., nested lists or tree view). It serves as a verification step for the AI's output.
tasks.testStrategy: End-to-end tests for data fetching and rendering accuracy. User acceptance testing for readability.
